scripts.preinstall: node -e "const v=parseInt(process.version.slice(1));if(v<18||v>=23){console.error('\x1b[31mError: Node 18-22 required (got '+process.version+'). Use: volta pin node@20 or nvm use 20\x1b[0m');process.exit(1)}"
scripts.build: npm run build:core && npm --workspace apps/web run build
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:core && npm --workspace apps/web run typecheck
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:e2e
scripts.verify: npm run lint && npm run typecheck && npm run build && npm run test
